name: Star Mining Co.
description: Use your customisable super-drill to carve your way through asteroids to reveal the riches held within. Use your new-found wealth to buy upgraded parts for even faster destruction! But be careful - failure to make a profit for the Star Mining Co. will terminate your contract, and YOU, permanently!

name: MetaZoo: Cryptid Clash
description: MetaZoo: Cryptid Clash is a free-to-play fast paced strategic card game where your surroundings matter, based on the original Collectable Card Game. Join forces with cryptids like Mothman, Bigfoot, Quetzalcoatlus, and Loveland Frogman to battle your friends around the world!

name: Build Fight Game
description: Build Fight Game is a class-based shooter set in a fully interactable voxel based environment. Create, destroy, and shoot your way to victory with your team in procedurally-generated multiplayer maps!

name: Meowmunitions
description: This game gives you a roguelike bullet hell experience where you play as a cat whose eggs were stolen by the birds. Do your best to retrieve the eggs by Picking up Random Crafting components to Customize your own gun, and Shoot down the birds.

name: Sinistrium
description: A singleplayer horror game about exploring abandoned places. A tense escape room vibe combined with psychological horror. Unearth the buried truths and escape before the malevolent forces lurking within claim you as their own.

name: Marisa of Liar-top Mountain
description: 'Marisa of Liartop Mountain' is an adventure-roleplaying game, where you, the player, will play as Reimu and explore a mountain of books filled with mysteries and lies in search of the whereabouts of the missing Marisa.

name: DI: Debt is Inevitable
description: DI is an endless wave-based FPS where you must micromanage the ever-increasing shop prices in order to defeat ever-increasing hordes of enemies. Powered by GZDoom.

name: Project Redsun
description: Project Redsun is a zombie First person shooter. You have to defend yourself against hoards of zombies coming straight for you.

name: Nope Rope
description: Combining many ideas from a time when games were simpler, nope rope is a blast from the past. Nip your friends in the butt in local multiplayer, or blow them to pieces over the network. Design your own levels and make your own challenges. Do you have what it takes when it's snek versus snek?

name: Poly Speed
description: Poly Speed is a Low Poly racing game with an open world. You can play races against your friends or AI's. You can try to get the World Record in one of the races. Or build your own races to play with your friends.

name: Star Conflict: Tornado (Deluxe Edition)
description: This pack includesGunship fighter “Tornado”Active module “Tornado systems overcharge”Additionally, the pilot receives:Unique painting “Nocturnal hunter”Additionally, the pilot receives modules:Combat rebootEngine overchargeInhibitor swarmHull restoration systemVernier enginesEmergency barrierAdaptive shieldCrystal platesSpecial bonus for

name: Star Conflict: Dyrnwyn (Deluxe Edition)
description: This bundle includesImperial rank 17 ECM interceptor DyrnwynEM Weapon “Plasma Discharger”Active module “Infobarrier”CPU modifier “Heir Algorithm”Additionally, the pilot receives:Unique paint “Lightning”.Additionally, the pilot receives:Repair system sabotageStasis GeneratorEnergy AbsorberShield Booster SEmergency BarrierVernier...

name: Star Conflict: Custodian (Deluxe Edition)
description: This pack includesJericho guard frigate “Custodian”. Rank 17Additionally, the pilot receives:Unique title “Custodian captain”Unique colourings “Snake” and “Crater”Unique decor “Sundial”Additionally, the pilot receives modules:“Spectre” fieldPulsarEmergency shield boostMultiphase shield adapterAuxiliary shield projectorVoltage...

name: Hard Landing: Industry - Come Out to Surface
description: In this DLC, colonists can operate on the planet surface. With new buildings such as science campuses and cyber bays for them to work in. A new threat: Sandstorms! It will gradually destroy pipes, cables and conveyors. To repair them, you'll need to build repair robots in the cyber bays.

name: Eldoran
description: Explore an open world in Eldoran, build settlements, rescue survivors, discover new technologies, and battle numerous foes. Your adventure awaits in this unique reality born from the merging of two worlds!

name: ModularWeaponsGame
description: Sin descripción

name: Warden of Time
description: Manipulate time to your whim! Use your powers of time manipulation to advance in this 2D puzzle adventure!

name: Hidden Cats In Old City Block
description: Find cute cats in the quiet and cozy old city block. Can you find them? Meow Meow...Kittens are calling you！

name: Goofy Goober Simulator
description: Blast and crash through hordes of dangerous "zombies" as the titular "Goofy Goober" in this "video game". Collect Powerful items, obtain Powerful weapons, and defeat Powerful monsters in quickly paced action combat encounters. But Watch Out

name: Hellopoly
description: Jump into a colorful world of business demons, risky high-height platforming, and full-on epic adventure in Hellopoly: the world's greatest corporate demon adventure platformer!

name: Offworlders
description: A retro-futuristic single player survival RPG where you control a hand-picked team of 4 separate characters; each with their own unique specializations, attributes, and inventories.

name: Lay of the Land
description: Lay of the Land is a sandbox adventure game set in a fantasy world where everything is physically simulated. Use the environment to your advantage and Explore, Fight, Loot and Build your way through mysterious lands.

name: Foodie novice village
description: Set up your own farm, venture into the forest, find precious recipes and ingredients, enjoy the food you grow, and taste different foods in different scenes.

name: Fish Folk: Jumpy
description: Fish Folk is a tactical 2D shooter, played by 2-4 players online or on a shared screen. Aim straight left or right; the rest is up to clever movement and timing in this fish-on-fish brawler!

name: Phantasia
description: Spooky PHantasy survival game! Collect and Conjure spells to Escape your Nightmare

name: Lucifer Lives in Lower Manhattan
description: Lucifer Lives in Lower Manhattan is a 1940s Crime Noir Murder Mystery Visual Novel with non-linear game play and a subtle love letter to classic adventure games of the 80s and 90s.

name: Network Engineer Simulator
description: In Network Engineer Simulator you are hired to do the unenviable job of cleaning up data closets. You will visit various locations from small closets to large data centers where you will need to untangle and organize these server racks and ensure various services are operational.

name: Moai
description: Rip around Easter Island on your scooter, take lots of photos, learn from ancient writings, and discover who carved each Moai in this puzzling island adventure!

name: Joe Mama
description: Joe Mama offers a unique blend of puzzle-solving and mind bending art style! Dive into the tale of the legendary furry figure, Joe Mama, as you navigate intricate puzzles, survive challenging environments, and unravel the captivating mysteries of his world.

name: Dice TD
description: Dice TD is a board-themed tower defense game with fantasy dice, instead of towers. Merge your dice to increase their pips and powers. Defend your base from the incoming enemies and construct epic mazes to slow them down.

name: Woodland Sonata
description: Embark on an odyssey where music weaves the tale. In this enchanting world, become a musician bestowed with a mystical flute, unraveling puzzles and mysteries. Command nature's elements, control animals, and shape the landscape with your melodies.

name: Loot Improvement
description: Loot Improvement is a topdown roguelike in which you try to collect as much loot as possible. Use the upgrade system to improve your loot. Find optimal paths to collect as much loot as possible.

name: MorphaVerse
description: Explore the world of MorphaVerse, collect and train monsters for your team. Use cards to support your monsters in battle!

name: Inside SCP-167
description: Inside SCP-167 is a first-person psychological horror game that combines investigation and puzzle-solving. Take on the role of Alex, the most experienced agent of the SCP Foundation, and explore a labyrinth of cubic rooms in order to put an end to a growing evil that is spreading throughout the area

name: Elysium Skies
description: The four Winds have stopped blowing and the Dark Prince of Dremor is casting the world into darkness. Can you the unexpected hero save the lands of Al'lysca?

name: Gas Station Story
description: A surreal slice-of-life about a mysterious computer virus and its effects on the city you live in. Navigate day-to-day decisions, fall in love with your coworker, and alienate your customers by being rude in this dystopian desert ring-‘em-up — featuring graphics created with a Game Boy Camera!

name: Scuttle
description: Scuttle across the sands in an exhilarating musically charged adventure. Groove to the beat to jump and boost your way through treacherous dunes and risky seas in this mesmerizing 3D platformer with rhythm game elements.

name: House of Shadows
description: House of Shadows is a gripping thriller through the eyes of detective Alexia, who bursts into a mysterious village invites you into a horror experience.Players will investigate in-depth and make difficult decisions and try to solve mysterious events in the depths of the cursed village of Unheilsdorf

name: Vermilion Arcade: Horror Collection
description: Vermilion Arcade is a collection of 8+ horror games inside a surreal and mysterious arcade.

name: Super: Taxi Simulation
description: Explore the city in 'sUper: Taxi Simulation'! Navigate busy streets, pick up diverse passengers, and customize your cab. Balance speed and safety, tackle traffic and day-night cycles. Thrive in this dynamic taxi driving adventure. Ready, set, drive!

name: Evergreen South
description: Multiplayer or Co-op survival game to play with friends and family. Build what you desire or build with templates from the our workshop! Tame animals, kill beasts. Live like the real world!

name: Esports Manager 2024
description: Welcome to Esports Manager! Dive into competitive gaming, manage your team, navigate the player market, build an unbeatable squad, and compete in tournaments. Elevate player skills, forge connections, and lead your team to victory. Ready to become the ultimate Esports Manager? The game is on!

name: Overlord: Escape From Nazarick - Limited Collector's Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Sword and Fairy: Together Forever - Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Pet Shop Simulator 2
description: Welcome back to the world of our dear friends in Pet Shop Simulator 2! We reintroduce you to new and more animal species. Build your own pet shop. In addition to new exotic species, you will also be able to breed and adopt cats and dogs.

name: LEGO Star Wars
description: Play through a LEGO recreation of the opening of Star Wars Episode III: Revenge of the Sith as Anakin Skywalker. Build new pathways, solve challenging puzzles and wield your lightsaber through 18 action-packed levels, battling through the Trade Federation cruiser to rescue Chancellor Palpatine from the clutches of General Grievous.

name: Wanko to Asobou! Mezase Dog Trainer!
description: Sin descripción

name: Colored Ball: Speedball Rush
description:
Colored Ball: Speedball Rush is an exhilarating, quick ball game that will give you an adrenaline rush! Direct the fastball only to enter the gate with the same color as the color ball. If you love colorful ball game, this is a perfect game for you! Why don’t you give our speed ball game a go and have the time of your life?
do you know how to play this fast-paced speed ball game? The game mechanic is very simple. The quick ball will get through colored barrier. Each time it runs through it, this zooming space ball will change it color to the barrier’s color. You have to direct the color ball only to touch the gate with the same color as the fastball. It’s definitely a challenge to direct the ball when it’s going fast like this

name: Detective: Ritual of the Sea
description: Step into the shoes of an experienced detective and uncover dark secrets while solving criminal cases. In this thrilling detective world, you'll face stressful decision-making moments, reconstruct crime scenes, and utilize cutting-edge technology for evidence analysis. Your mission will be to discover motives and connections between suspects, spot lies and inconsistencies in testimonies, interrogate witnesses to unveil the truth, collaborate with other law enforcement agencies, gather evidence, and apply deduction and reasoning to solve the most complex criminal cases.

name: MLB The Show 24: Negro Leagues Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Station Obscurum
description: Venture into the Station. Navigate through its dark halls and decrepit rooms. Confront the monsters that lurk in the dark and discover the many mysteries contained in this ancient space station. Find what you need to repair your ship and escape. Your life depends on it!

name: Observe
description: Collaborate with yourself to change the past, future and present by replaying your mistakes and making new ones in this single-player puzzle game.

name: Summer at the Edge of the Universe
description: A multi-route, solarpunk yuri visual novel about intergalactic sightseeing and reconnecting (plus maybe falling in love) with old friends. Three routes to choose!

name: Forest Warden
description: Forest Warden is a 2D action-adventure game. With the powers granted to you by the mainland gods, you must thwart the queen's invading army. As you gain experience, the gods will grant you new powers. But you have to be fast, as time passes the virus is taking over the island.

name: Dragon Fate: Cards and Minigames
description: Dive into a medieval card game of strategy and nostalgia. Build decks, harness elements, and master Mini Games to defeat Elemental Dragons. A blend of skill, luck, and strategy awaits!

name: Pylonauts
description: Pylonauts is a sci-fi cinematic puzzle adventure. Two robots must travel between worlds on a mission to reunite a lost child with their own kind. Strategic use multiple characters, their abilities and resources is key to success.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: La-5F Series 38 Collector Plane
description: Sin descripción

name: Police Force: Law and Honor
description: Police Force: Law and Honor is a global multiplayer battle-royale game in a cartoon-style world as a police officer, soldier, or mercenary. Play in single-player mode, or show off your skills in battle royale and play with potential friends around the world in multiplayer mode.

name: The Legend of Chosen Blood
description: "The Legend of Chosen Blood" is a new generation pixel-style ARPG game! Place yourself in a fantasy world where darkness and magic blend, overcome unknown dangers and defeat powerful monsters! Uncover the ancient legends of this continent!

name: The Luckiest in the Megaverse
description: Will you join the Lucky Club? Are you the Luckiest in the Megaverse? Find out in this mind-blowing clicker game where only luck matters.

name: Heroes of the Citadel
description: Step into Heroes of the Citadel to save the world. A casual squad RPG game with a rooster of dozens of characters to collect. Fight in many modes selecting a team of 6 to best suit your preferred game tactic. Win both single-player campaigns and multiplayer brawls. Save the world and have fun!

name: Gardener
description: In Gardener, every leaf matters. Unveil the potential of the next-gen virtual garden🥕. Plant and maintain accurately simulated gardens, made of your own procedurally generated plant species. Discover, grow and shape unlimited species. Become a Gardener of Tomorrow‍.

name: Farmer's Diary
description: There is a lot of work to be done on this farm, a long-term adventure awaits you where you can take farming, orcharding and animal husbandry to the next level with your friends.

name: My Interstellar Inn
description: From the romantic star period, to the first class star show, to all kinds of strange foreign star show, from the time of the star to the sky. Various types of new businesses such as alcoholic beverages,Operate a restaurant, seeds, cultivated animals, wine, love, customer openings, exhibitions, etc.

name: Home In Alien
description: Welcome to Home In Alien, a 2D sandbox survival and construction game where you'll play as a human survivor on his own in a strange and dangerous alien world, battling with various factions, building and operating his own colony, and exploring and unraveling the mysteries of the planet.

name: Look At Me
description: Stealth into social media life in the humorous universe of "Look at Me" which takes you on an adventure to destroy the fake posters of his notorious Uncle who became an evil influencer.

name: Galactico
description: Embark on epic battles in GALACTICO, the exhilarating slap-em-up platformer! Throw down with friends in dynamic remote clashes or enjoy uproarious mayhem on a single screen. Can you be the sole winner in this cosmic arena?

name: The District VR
description: Enter The District VR, where Berlin's music and nightlife come alive. Aspiring DJ or seasoned pro, the decks await your touch in this immersive multiplayer world. Explore, create, and lose yourself in the rhythm.

name: Inka Aventura: Saga de Pachakutiq
description: Inka Adventure is a platform-type video game set in the time of Prince Cusi Yupanqui, the Inka prince who would become the legendary Inka Pachakutiq, the Inka who transformed the Inka lordship into an entire Empire.

name: Farm Invaders
description: Farm Invaders is a casual, roguelite, bullet hell featuring Daisy, an angry cow seeking revenge for her abducted friend. Join Daisy and her furious friends as they try to uncover the secrets of this alien invasion.

name: Megalotrain
description: Megalotrain is a roguelike game designed to offer a swift gaming experience, ideal for players seeking quick challenges and the thrill of progressing as far as possible in a single session, with the potential to complete it in under an hour.

name: South Scrimshaw: Part Two
description: South Scrimshaw, Part Two continues the story of one life in a vast alien ocean. It is a richly illustrated experimental visual novel, written in the style of a nature documentary.

name: The Chalice of Illusion
description: Figure it out yourself! Observe, experiment and test your assumptions about an unorthodox magic system as you attempt to outmaneuver, swindle and topple your demise in the discovery-oriented "castlebrainia" mystery puzzle adventure.

name: Greenwood Falls
description: Embark on a crazy cozy journey to find medicine for your father.

name: Ominous Obscurity
description: Ominous Obscurity is a single-player horror adventure game set in places from the protagonist's childhood. Solve interesting puzzles, while hiding from insidious horrors waiting for you in the shadows.

name: Life Blood
description: You awaken on the Altar inside the Life Cathedral. Venture down into the mountainous kingdom in this first-person, souls-like experience with focus on exploration. loot villages on the cliffside, navigate the spiraling stone dungeons, and unseal the secrets hidden within the heart of the mountain.

name: Covid19: Toilet Paper Run
description: Set in the early stage of COVID-19 pandemic, this third person "shooter" has you disinfect your way through coronavirus infested city square using hand sanitizer filled spray bottles. Now's your chance to get back at the virus that affected us all (and help Jeff get some toilet paper in the process)

name: Shadow of the Curse-Eater
description: The wilderfolk of Ushinega Island waste away in a rotting tropical paradise, haunted by a deadly malediction. Yet behind every curse lurks a secret. You have the power to save them... but should you?

name: Growth Experiment
description: "In a certain apartment room, 'I' began a life with 'Chloe,' who had lost intelligence and memory. By navigating between the present and the past, it becomes clear what happened to the deteriorated 'Chloe.' Whether you interpret the ending as a happy one is entirely up to you."

name: Mushroom Kid's Big Grass Sword
description: Play as a mushroom kid on a journey to save their village with a sword that grows! Meet wacky characters and wield the Blade of Grass: a magical sword you can use to scale walls and swing around danger. Watch as it grows to comical lengths and stop the bird that captured the mushroom people! ️

name: Iskhaar3D
description: An in-depth space and economy simulation meets simple twin-stick controls. Iskhaari people have been exiled by the Khanid Emperor to a contested region of the galaxy. Through the means of military, economy and politics conquer this region for the House of Iskhaar.

name: Spherix
description: Spherix combines creature collection with thrilling real-time action combat in a vibrant MMO open world. Capture, battle, evolve and customize your Spherix. Explore dungeons, complete quests, unveil mysteries and build the most powerful team. A new adventure awaits. Are you ready?

name: Silent Nightmares: A Christmas Story
description: Make your way through the chilling realm of survival horror, where immersive visuals, gripping first-person gameplay, and expertly crafted narratives converge to deliver a heightened sense of realism to the terror you'll encounter.

name: Saving Astral
description: Somewhere among the stars awaits a remedy for your Mother. Search a vast mysterious Planet on the verge of collapse while fighting to survive. What perils await you? What will become of the Planet? What legacy will you carve into the skies? What fate awaits your Mother.

name: Echo Chambers
description: Echo Chamber is a Horror Roguelike Deckbuilder that challeneges your sanity as you shoot down terrors and manage your deck to survive in an ever-changing, procedurally generated world! Can you trust what you've been told?

name: Li-Lo
description: Li-Lo is a single-player puzzle platformer in which you run, jump and solve puzzles to guide your small family through a beautiful and mysterious world. Enjoy bittersweet moments of bonding and growth, before life skips ahead to its next chapter.

name: CrypticaL
description: An ancient entertainment in a futuristic universe, at least for the audiance. Our main character is a retired soldier who forced to fight in a gladiator arena. Escape, find the responsibles, punish!

name: Granvir
description: Granvir is an action roguelite featuring mech building. Scavenge the battlefield for parts to replace and upgrade your arms, legs, torso and weaponry. PIlot your Granvir and manage your campaign between battles to find the best equipment and stay supplied.

name: Into
description: Into is an action puzzle game where players need to explore and decipher to find ways to escape this unfamiliar world. The game is full of unknown creatures and puzzles. The game has multiple endings, and the player's choices and investigations will determine the final outcome.

name: My Evil Clones
description: My evil clones is a dynamic shooter-puzzle game where players combat armed aggressive clones. Face diverse enemies, use agility and strategy to survive, and prevent a global catastrophe.

name: Gold Seeker
description: Gold Seeker is a sandbox game in a small area. You and several other enemy drones are searching for ancient fossils in the depths of the planet's surface. Your tool is a recycling terra laser. Collect as many coins as possible and win this treasure race.

name: The Air Ruler
description: The Air Ruler is a 2D side-scrolling shooter with unique graphics and addictive gameplay, Aeria defies the darkness, reveals the secrets of the underwater kingdom and restores peace and harmony in the waters that he loves and protects.

name: ThePoliticalUnderground
description: A Satirical Political Fighting Game

name: Resttore
description: Craft, build and upgrade your character as you explore a fantasy open world full of secrets and help its habitants defeat the creatures that brought this place to its end.

name: Mithra
description: A cryptic puzzle/adventure game that blurs the line between fiction and reality. A tale of cultish affairs that sweeps through the nighttime streets of London, weaves through the back alleys of Beijing and beyond. Come with us.

name: Go Deep Or Go Home
description: Dive into a thrilling medieval fantasy adventure as a daring dungeon crawler. Loot dungeons for rare artifacts and treasure, face deadly traps, and battle foul creatures. Decorate your home with the spoils of conquest. Go Deep Or Go Home!

name: Space Ops Arcade
description: Survive Kepler's alien onslaught. Top-down shooter with epic multiplayer on the way!

name: Phobos Down
description: A sci-fi twin stick shooter stripped down to the bare essentials with focus on smooth controls and satisfying action.

name: Hell Spheres
description: Hell Spheres - A game in the Top Down Shooter genre, where the player controls a spherical clot of energy, which must collect other spheres with energy and increase in size, increasing which the player becomes cramped within the level.

name: Move Blocks
description: Move Blocks - A calming game in which the player needs to clear the way for the cat in the box so that she can escape! Control with the mouse, click on the desired object and use the direction of the mouse to push them in the directions you need.

name: Stress Ball
description: Experience the blend of fun and challenge with Stress Ball! In this 3D ball game, your character bounces through platforms toward the goal. As levels intensify, and a dark theme adds depth to the atmosphere, immerse yourself in the thrill of overcoming increasingly difficult obstacles.

name: Overgun
description: Try this fast-paced sci-fi shooter as an elite OVERGUN mercenary. Go to the moon base of the EARTH ROBOTICS corporation to destroy an army of various robots under the command of an evil AI.

name: Ocean Gap
description: Dive into a co-op underwater horror game. Find and destroy energy cubes to stop the secret organization's experiments. Don't get lost in dark and deep waters. Don't get caught but breathe!

name: Don't Go in the woods
description: Defy legends, face a forest monster. solve puzzles, and confront your fears in a chilling battle. Will you conquer the darkness or become a haunting tale?

name: Dash or Die
description: Climb to the top of the world using your special double jump and dash abilities and more !

name: Five Starless Rivers
description: A point-and-click adventure game featuring an undergraduate student who needs to find the Helm of Hades while also trying to navigate adult life in contemporary Athens.

name: Lily & Ghost
description: Sin descripción

name: Colorful Katana
description: Samurai Champloo meets a bloody blend of graffiti and guns. Slice through a hip-hop infused feudal Japan. Cut down revenge-fueled bosses. Paint it red. And blue. And orange. You get the point.

name: Guinea Pig
description: Adopt a new pet and embark on this journey to help him find a safe place.

name: Jipoiz
description: Enjoy a fantastic fantasy battle! It's an isometric view PVP action game where you can use various weapons

name: The Paper Trials Chapter 3
description: A first-person horror maze game. Hiding & Standing still is Death. Run or you are DEAD. Trapped in a realm of nightmarish mazes with your only hope of survival is to find all of the pages to the mysterious book and ESCAPE!

name: Mini Star Imposters
description: Mini Star Imposters is a game where you have to find and kill all 4 Imposters hiding among 16 others within the time limit. Use your intuition, memory, and luck to find and kill the 4 Imposters.

name: NightFall Shade
description: 2D real-time survival action. A somber journey through lands ravaged by a long siege. Extensive and complex combat, hardcore survival and deep immersion. Heal the heart of an old castle... or share its darkness.

name: Dead Faces
description: Dead Faces is a mind bending psychological horror about hallucinations and facing your past. Unravel Jack's disturbing mind, the faces from his past and the ultimate truth behind his actions. You must remember their faces.

name: Lingering Souls
description: Lingering Souls is a first-person psychological horror game set inside a recently deceased family relatives post-soviet era apartment.

name: Super Pitfall II
description: A cancelled North American localization of Atlantis no Nazo, rebranding it as part of the Pitfall series.

name: Hero Cummy
description:
Enter U.A High, a school for training the next generation of heroes and heroines! Though our hero didn’t enroll just to attend a few classes, a few strange secrets lie below the school’s surface- starting with the mysterious fate of your father.

Unlock the full potential of your quirk’s abilities and all of the lewd powers that come with it. Decide if you’re looking for revenge or answers as you interact with the school’s students and staff. Enjoy a variety of lewd scenes with your favorite characters, and explore a whole range of fun kinks along the way! We hope you enjoy!

name: Brave Hero: Puzzle Dungeon Card
description: It's a game that combines Roguelike exploration with card game strategy. Players explore an ever-changing 4x4 grid dungeon, encountering a variety of enemies and surprises through a card-flipping mechanism. Strategic deck building and skill synergy are crucial in battling powerful enemies.

name: Mercenary Squad Auto Chess
description: A light Roguelike auto chess game that combines dark treasure hunting gameplay. Different professions can be paired with various skills, equipment can be collected, attributes can be refined, and powerful teams can be created by enhancing skills with runes.

name: Youka and Her Summer
description: Youka woke up from her dream, but her heart was filled with unease: it was the same home as usual, but it had become incredibly strange due to the nightmare. She couldn't remember exactly what had happened, but it seemed that the reality before her wasn't so "real."

name: Tachie ga Hen na Pose no Renai Adventure
description: All the characters are in strange poses, but that's normal for this game. A school romance novel game set in a strange world.

name: Burnout Chaos: Drift Car Project
description: Sin descripción

name: Lawn Tennis Games
description: lawn tennis game is a really exciting tournament game for everyone to enjoy. Pick up your virtual tennis racket and enjoy unlimited tennis tournament with this fun and exciting game! This tennis racket game is fun, offline, and free!

name: Snake Colors: Slithering Game
description: Move the colorful snake to destroy the hurdles with the same colors but avoid the ones with different colors.

name: Shattered Kingdoms
description: Immerse yourself in the epic world of "Shattered Kingdoms," an MMORPG that harks back to the golden age of classic games like Runescape and Tibia. Crafted with passion for fans of the genre, this game invites you into a realm where every choice and every adventure writes the saga of your journey.

name: Racing Go
description: Racing Go is a car game where you have to use your driving skills on exciting tracks! In the game you will find a lot of different tracks and several types of cars! Overcome unusual obstacles, maneuver, and get to the finish line within a certain time!

name: Psyko
description: PSYKO is a brutally-fast motorcycle combat game. Outrun and outgun while squeezing through traffic at breakneck speeds. Traffic is your arena, and danger is fuel. Ride the line between blistering pace and tactical precision.

name: Lones
description: Lones is a single-player adventure. Leave stress behind and live off-grid in the Canadian woods. Investigate and uncover the truth behind a mysterious and peculiar shadow.

name: Idle Streaming Bonanza
description: In this parody of popular streamers! Play as your Favorite content creators(I use that term loosely) like Mokipane, Asmondsilver and CQX. Form a cult! Squeeze your pay piggies, start drama, appease chat and rake in the dough.

name: Fegefeuer Soul Tower
description: Fegefeuer Soul Tower is a Cozy Adventure (Up to 4 Player). Manage a Shop, Farm and City while fighting through a Tower to escape the Fegefeuer.

name: MilkwaySubway
description: 《MlikwaySubway》 is a sci-fi 2.5D RPG.Players need to play the role of scientific researchers Miallai, explore the vast universe, go through thick and thin together with Octo，see the truth of the "ashes", and ultimately continue the flame of civilization.

name: Solaria
description: Guide your city from fledgling solarpunk community to futuristic metropolis, one tile at a time. Watch your citizens survive and thrive. Solaria is a minimalist, solarpunk city builder where the city builds itself!

name: Rapid Soccer
description: The first truly physics-based football (soccer) game with highly intelligent AI opponents. Jump into career mode and guide your favorite club or country to cup glory! Play with up to 8 friends in local multiplayer or challenge other people from all over the world in online tournaments!

name: Madnessarum
description: You're stranded on an island with other players. Your goal is to explore the island, collect as many resources as possible, and then try to escape the island to replenish your camp's stock.

name: Ocean of Mermaids
description: Get your boat ready and sail into darkness of The Great Cauldron, an isolated ocean infested with bloodthirsty beasts and not less menacing people. Don't let the red tide consume you.

name: Reborn a Zombie 2: Entwined Hearts
description: In this sequel of the LGBT visual novel Reborn a Zombie, Dawn, a trans girl turned zombie, now has to confront her past. However, the Demon King is approaching and his presence will change everything.

name: Fish Combat: Arcade
description: Speed through hoards in this Speed based Combat Game!! Out maneuver your enemies and drift around fully 3D arcade levels!

name: The Meridian Under the Heaven: Valhalla
description: Valhalla is a Yuri-themed cinematic narrative visual novel focusing on the sisterly love and transformation of Hikari and Nøva, heiresses of Norway's leading biotech giant Ravenscorp, evolving from naïveté to power, culminating in Hikari's rise as 'The Black Raven.'

name: Spherocious
description: In this precision platformer, take on the role of endangered animals forced into a defensive territorial battle. Roll, bounce, and blast your way through the Amazon’s uncharted locales. Save fellow animal guardians and push a greedy corporate logging operation out of your rainforest home!

name: Kukinta
description: Step into Kukinta, a unique blend of city-building and idle crafting. Assemble resources and refine them into complex goods to develop your island community. Let your strategic skills blossom. In Kukinta, every resource shapes the skyline of your serene retreat.

name: SCP: Foundation Simulator
description: SCP: Foundation Simulator is a strategic simulation game where the player oversees an organization dedicated to containing and experimenting on supernatural phenomena.

name: Stitched Together
description: Stitched Together is an RPG adventure with a deep story, unique battle mechanics, world-defying stakes, and a whole extra dimension!

name: Nachzehrer
description: [h1]Nachzehrer[/h1]Your fear of being in the dark comes true in this short single player horror game. You find yourself stuck at a power plant at night, when suddenly the lights begin shutting off. However, attempting to turn them back on may cause you to meet your fears.

name: Mantra
description: Humanity is on the brink of extinction. Corrupted AI code caused thousands of industrial robots to turn into human-killing murder machines. As the former lead developer for Tenso Corp, you feel its your duty to right the wrongs that brought chaos to the world.

name: Wallace & Gromit: The Grand Tour
description: An unreleased Wallace & Gromit racing game that got reworked into the completely original Gubble Buggy Racer

name: Get Off My Lawn
description: Get Off My Lawn is an alt. controller FPS defense game where your goal is to keep your chair rocking while aiming your hose to spray away neighborhood kids trying to destroy your pristine lawn!

name: A Number From the Ghost
description: A surreal gallery leads to a collection of interactive music videos. Each contains its own world that responds to and interacts with what the player is hearing.

name: Colorless Poems
description:
Colorless Poems (色のない詩―ウタ―) is an exploration horror game made by Ryou Mutsumi (睦涼) in July 2020. It was translated into English by Yamikaze.

"When in doubt about where to go.
Look for the highest points.
Keep aiming for them.
Even if you're exhausted."

Colorless Poems is a story about a girl named Akari Yagura who was having amnesia as she only remembers fragments of her memories. Explore the story discovering what happened within while avoiding the monster who chasing you.

name: Puckish
description: Puckish, a mixed reality game of sentient billiards where all the rules are hidden in the text of a physical 140 year old book of etiquette.

name: Mass Effect: Corsair
description:
An unreleased spinoff in the Mass Effect series that got cancelled due to high production costs for the DS game cartridge.

The game would have been a combination of the games Privateer and Star Control set "in a part of the galaxy that was more piratey and not really fully explored", and the player would play as an independent character that explores, collects cargo, and sells information to the Human alliance.

name: Daikoukai Frontier
description: A pirate themed social game for mobile devices starring Ruby Heart from the Marvel Vs Capcom series.

name: Eternity's Child
description: An unreleased WiiWare Port of the PC game with the same name.

name: Dokopa
description: Dokopa is an online party game.

name: 3 Haikus a Little Guy Can Walk Around & Talk
description: 3 haikus a little guy can walk around & talk to is a memory that comes back to me occasionally, almost always in fragments that i can barely comprehend

name: Clockwerk
description: An unreleased game by Next Level Games which would have been about a pair of elderly Hausmeisters who take care of "the World Clock" named Otto and Herman, of whom just as they're about to retire have to stop some enemies from dismantling the said clock.

name: Portal Returns CE
description:
A fan made "Portal" (2007) 2D platformer game, made for the TI-84 calculator.

Portal. Enjoy blasting through space at breakneck speeds and almost being fried, crushed, and insulted all for the hope of cake at the end. With 78 total levels, the fun will probably end at some point. But that is why there is a level editor to make even more mind boggling puzzles. So, good luck, and remember that GLaDOS is always watching...

name: Possibility Space
description:
Possibility Space is a word game about exploring the possible outcomes of a conversation.

You will know you've experienced everything when the interface reads "100% explored". You can stop playing, or go back and read through the conversation.

name: Making The Leap
description:
Our first attempt at what we deem impossible seldom has the desired outcome. It is only through persistent effort and support that we can make The Leap.

'Making The Leap' was first created in Dreams for the Playstation 4, and has here been lovingly recreated for PC.

name: Itchana Tchones Zombie Terror
description:
In Itchana Tchones: Zombie Terror, it's Halloween Eve and the inhabitants of a small village are terrified by screams coming from a cave located in an old Indian cemetery. Those who entered the cave, to try to find out what was happening, mysteriously disappeared.

The city mayor then decided to call Itchana Tchones so that he could fight against this terror and return serenity to the village.

name: Drop It
description: Drop It: Stack a delectable fruit platter! Combine fruits strategically for higher scores, but beware of the limited space. How many fruits can you fit before it spills out over the edge? Retry for a fresh shot at the High Score! Ready to taste victory? Drop in now and see how high you can stack!

name: Tank Ball
description: Tank Ball is a Popular Multiplayer game created by Maid Marian. The game features different rooms just like Sherwood Dungeon, and also features different team colors. It is most easily compared to the battle arena in Sherwood. Teams are identified by the colors red, blue, green, and white. The newest version of tankball is Tank Ball 2. Unlike the previous version, Tank Ball 2 has new power ups, landscape, and has patched up many hacks such as invincibility. The land features of the game are very similar to those of Sherwood, having similar rocks, trees, and water. The controls in Tank Ball are simple: use the arrow keys to move, and the ctrl key to shoot. Tank Ball does have a current problem with hacking.

name: Cymbalism
description: Cymbalism was a Flash, Shockwave and Java-based mixer game from Phase 1 that was available on the Korean Double CD of Gorillaz and on the Recording Studio of the Kong Studios website from 2001 to 2003. The game consisted of mixing tools to the Gorillaz song "19-2000" with multiple stems for the track. Also on the website were stems and samples available on other rooms for other songs as well, such as samples and sound files for "Tomorrow Comes Today", "Hip Albatross" and many others, and multitrack stems for two demo songs: "Hand Clapper" and "Gor Beaten", the second one being not fully released to this day.

name: Neboslav
description: Neboslav is a relaxing roguelite action game. Using a jetpack, explore the procedurally generated, surreal world of floating islands. Defeat enemies and find epic upgrades! Win to reveal the strange history of the game world.

name: Gatcha Gear
description: Gatcha Gear is a side scrolling platform game where players will face challenging levels while guiding our tiny robot through a series of portals, each leading to a new bizarre and colorful dimension. Immerse yourself in a strange world, challenges, and excitement!!!

name: ShadowStrikeVR
description: "ShadowStrikeVR" is a sniper-themed VR shooting game and an award-winning entry in the Qualcomm XR Contest.

name: Residential Crusaders
description: Residential Crusaders is an action-packed adventure fighting video game. Join Barry and Wallace as they team up to save the world from the space warlord, Mortifer. Experience fast-paced, intense battles as you fight through hordes of enemies to bring down Mortifer and restore peace to the world.

name: Seas of Rebellion
description: Seas of Rebellion is an action-adventure rogue-like in which you'll explore the open ocean and fight back against the many forces seeking to invade your land!

name: Neon Auto Party
description: Build a party to auto-battle through waves of enemies in a futuristic fantasy setting. Each unit has its own deck of cards that determines their performance in battle. Find and buy items while leveling up units to take advantage of powerful synergies and reach the end of the dungeon!

name: Immortal Emptiness
description: Immortal Emptiness is a first-person shooter with roguelike elements in which you get to navigate a deathless post-apocalyptic world and fight endless battles against nightmarish foes. Explore, fight and unravel the mysteries of a world where mortality is but a fleeting concept.

name: Interstellar Inn
description: Interstellar Inn is a hotel building and management sim in space.

name: Giggly's Park
description: Giggly's Park is a procedural horror platformer, where the goal is to escape from a creepy giant playground before Giggly, the hollow clown catches you! A haunting creature that feasts on bad behaved children at his colorful realm.

name: Of Dead Earth
description: Of Dead Earth is a third-person survival horror game set in Australian Outback.

name: Dungeon Slasher
description: Navigate a map filled with enemies, destroying all those who get in your way! Collect the spoils of battle, upgrading your character with what you find! Use a variety of character, artifact, and skill synergies to bring down the dungeon!

name: The Paper Arcade: Snake
description: In this game, you will control a cute little paper snake and guide it through a vibrant world of paper mazes and obstacles.

name: Scythe Machine
description: A fast-paced sci-fi / fantasy multiplayer action roguelike that requires balancing PvE with PvP. Use augments to gain new abilities and get stronger as you navigate your way from chamber to chamber to reach the end and take control of the Machine.

name: Rings of Eden
description: Rings of Eden is an indie open-world RPG inspired by Souls-like games, that blends fantasy, science-fiction, adventure and satisfying combat.

name: Physint
description:
Kojima Productions, in partnership with Sony Interactive Entertainment, during the State of Play presentation on 31 January 2024, announced a new espionage action game for PlayStation.

This new action-espionage game will use cutting-edge technology and a stellar cast to deliver an experience like no other. Blurring the boundaries between film and games, offering near life-like graphics and a new take on interactive entertainment.

name: Sherlock: The Network
description: A game based on the Sherlock TV series.

name: Espionage
description: Espionage is a 2D narrative puzzle game. The story is set on an alternate history of World War II. You will be a spy deep within enemy lines, facing life-and-death trials and the choice between morality and duty in a series of operations, ultimately growing into a true revolutionary warrior.

name: Entropy
description: Step into a high-stakes, sci-fi FPS adventure where survival, base-building, and high time-to-kill combat merge in a dynamic, fully explorable spherical world.

name: Elementum
description: Elementum is a challenging roguelike dungeon crawler with elemental spells and bullet hell elements. Fight in multiple rooms defeating a wide range of enemy encounters, and by doing so, discover multiple spells and augments to craft your own build and playstyle!

name: Eat the Rich
description: Be a billionaire, team up and betray your friends all at once in EAT THE RICH! A social party game for 6-10 players where you play mini games, vote out the competition, conspire to get ahead, all in a bid to be the richest!

name: Dive The Depths
description: Dive The Depths is an action-roguelike set beneath the ocean's surface. As a humble diver, you must navigate the world filled with bizarre sea creatures, submerged ruins, and forgotten histories. Can you conquer the depths and unravel the secrets that hidden beneath the waves?

name: Digitalter
description: Simple, zen puzzle game where you alter sequences of digits in columns and rows.

name: Deepmess
description: DEEPMESS is a turn-based tactics descent into the mind of god. Armed with a hammer and nail, tunnel your way through layers of flesh and bone while thinking one floor ahead. Dig deep and make mess through intense, god-lobotomizing fun.

name: Deep Down
description: Deep Down is a narrative roguelike deckbuilder about emotional resilience. Restore your relationships through card-based dialogues, express, transform and even repress emotions conveyed through cards, and confront buried memories to break the cycle.

name: Deathray
description: Immerse yourself in the eerie atmosphere of an abandoned laboratory with the effect of photorealism. Explore mysterious things, solve puzzles. But be careful, you are always being hunted.

name: Dear Edmund
description: Navigate a Victorian street under strict party rule. As Edmund, choose between personal gain and community health. Manage resources, upgrade your home and street, and face a dynamic environment. Your decisions will shape your destiny and the street's future.

name: DearMyFriend
description: Set off to the unknown world Stargather Land now. The shadow of chaos is shrouding here for so long, a girl from another world shoulders the responsibility of saving this land. Travel with the power of elements until the end of destiny, only fight will lead her to the finish.

name: Death Machine
description: Conquer the mechanical citadel in Death Machine - a metroidvania, with a roguelite item system. Gather items to gain strength, navigate the perilous machine world, leverage the aid of ancient demons, and seek out dangerous denizens to defeat before the forces of the machine close in on you.

name: Dead End
description: Use all opportunities to survive as long as possible.

name: Dark Energy
description: A 2D space action RPG with a slow and deliberate style, reminiscent of the Soulslike genre.

name: Dark Bows
description: Embark on a mesmerizing journey through breathtaking landscapes and uncover the mysterious story of Princess Heila, which revolves around her quest to uncover the long-buried secrets of her family and kingdom.

name: Daniel Pintado's Land Of Silence
description: Land of Silence is a Survival Zombie post-apocalyptic open world and open ending game, bringing back old school survival horror with modern touches. Managing scarce resources such as food, drink and ammunition.

name: Dangerous adventure
description: Dangerous adventure is an adventure game with role-playing game (RPG) elements. You have to take on the role of a traveler who was shipwrecked and ended up on an unnamed island. Arm yourself with a magical staff and explore mysterious locations, get out of the maze, fight monsters in a dark dungeon!

name: Cursed sarcophagus
description: Cursed sarcophagus is an addictive 3D puzzle game where you have to lower sarcophagi on or off the island. In the game you will find many different levels and blocks that you have to destroy! Complete the game from start to finish, solving interesting puzzles!

name: Crowncity
description: Building and managing a late medieval city is a series of challenges. Build wells to provide drinking water, markets to provide bread and food, and theaters to collect performance tax. Stage mode continues an interesting story and journey, random map mode fills each game with a new experience.

name: Creators
description: Creators is a first person shooter where users participate in massive battles either online or locally with AI. The game comes with a powerful in game scenario editor, ensuring that the only limit for what is possible is your imagination. Creators was meant to be fun above all else so enjoy!

name: CubeeRun Memories
description: CubeeRun Memories is a 2D die and retry runner, where the goal of the game is to finish a set of levels as quickly as possible. Opponents and obstacles may come in front of the player to add a little difficulty to each level.

name: Crystals
description: Crystals is a RPG game where you travel to another Dimension and have to fight multiple enemies using a turn-based combat system and avoid attacks like a platformer.

name: Cloaked Protocol: Tactical Espionage Action
description: Dive into Cloaked Protocol: an electrifying retro stealth-action game. Outwit elite mercenaries with strategic stealth in a world of espionage, where every move weaves a gripping narrative.

name: City Defense Z
description: City Defense Z is a strategy, city-building, and survival game where you place buildings with your cards during the day, construct your city by merging buildings of the same type, and defend against zombies attacking your city at night.

name: Circular Fever
description: A Classic 4-Key Rhythm Game - Easy to Learn, Hard to Master

name: Christmas Rush
description: Christmas Rush is a racing arcade game in the warm atmosphere of a winter holiday. You drive a car at high speed, trying to avoid obstacles and reach the finish line in a limited time.

name: Christmas Corp
description: Christmas is here, and the only way for elves to produce enough gifts in time, is to be micro-managed ! In Christmas Corp, Santa's elves are burnt out, and need to be told what to do every second. The player has to manage each of the elves' schedules so that the toy production goes smoothly.

name: Chick'n Mushroom Soup
description: Chick’n Mushroom Soup is an anime styled Visual Novel which you've been accepted into a culinary academy with sweet girls. Although you were a total asocial in the past, you now have an opportunity to change this.

name: Chess Twist
description: A game of chess set on a procedurally generated board, where tiles can have 3 or 5 diagonals and straight lines bend around your opponent's defenses. Same rules, different battlefield. Opportunities for new strategies are hidden in plain sight. Will you see them before your opponent does?

name: Healthy Hero: Tower Defense
description: Healthy Hero is a Tower Defense game where the player protects the hero from attacking junk food. You need to build and improve defense towers to stop the enemies. Levels get harder with new types of junk food and waves, but you can get items and improve towers. Be a real Healthy Hero and defeat the junk food!

name: The Protectorate
description: The enemy is approaching. What's your strategy? In this fusion of Tower Defense and Autobattler, optimize the power of your turrets, create strong synergies and wisely choose your bonuses... Or your maluses! Will you be able to defend your city against the hordes of furious monsters?

name: Fast Cars Small Islands
description: Build your island. Design your racetrack. Choose your favorite car and start racing. You will set the first time record for speeding around your racetrack. Will your friends be able to beat your record? How about other racers?

name: Pterodactyl Attack
description: In a world where the Earth is collapsing, help Rex, a fearless Tyrannosaurus, in a casual 2D platformer! Avoid deadly Pterodactyls and jump to escape. Vibrant HD graphics in an endless cycle of quest for survival.

name: Lost in Cairo
description: An open-world action-adventure RPG. You play as Soren on his journey through the desert to cure a rare mutation that prevents him from controlling his emotions. Explore a mysterious world where your actions impact your emotions, and discover what happens when you unleash them.

name: The Rising
description: Step into the paws of a hybrid dog. Hunt, track trails, learn the city's daily routines, spy on humans, scan old recordings and documents. Uncover the truth and report to the Great Worm. SURVIVE.

name: Helix: Descent N Ascent
description: Helix is an adventure game taking place in a melancholic disembodied world. Combine your powers to solve puzzles and explore further and deeper.

name: Dwarf Land
description: Embark on a journey in Dwarf Land, a procedurally generated open world. Master modular building amidst dense forests and towering peaks. Unleash creativity in crafting, hunting, and mining. Discover dwarven culture in a vibrant sandbox simulation. Dwarf Land awaits, a realm of endless possibilities.

name: Project Moonborn
description: Unleash werewolf fury in an ultra-violent 2D roguelike action platformer while seeking to rescue lost pups and escape interstellar prison.

name: People's World
description: I really wish they would just fight without me. Turn-based adventure RPG

name: Jupiter Melon
description: Go fast and avoid hazards as you hunt for artefacts to build out your deck.

name: Joe is Not Lost: Jigsaw Landscapes
description: Follow the first adventure of Joe the cat, far away from home, in a unique and sweet Jigsaw Puzzle. What awaits you when you set the last piece?

name: Chronicles of Lussaria
description: Forge through the story of Caynburn and save the country!

name: Requiem Reverie
description: Requiem Reverie is an immersive cooperative fantasy RPG that invites players to embark on an epic journey through a rich and expansive world filled with mysteries. The game places a strong emphasis on teamwork and strategic party mechanics, offering a deeply engaging and social gaming experience.

name: Junklands
description: Embark on a journey to transform a polluted world shackled by its toxic overlords. Explore the lands, brave the environment, battle polluting foes and clean up a dying world in an epic 3D action-adventure metroidvania.

name: Pokini Kagura
description: Parkour around an abandoned city defending cute animals from evil monsters. Style on the baddies with expressive shmovement and customizable combos. Rebuild your hometown with the help of your friends and relax in a soothing hot spring.

name: The Prisoning: Fletcher's Quest
description: After a visit to the psychologist that went horribly wrong you’re trapped in the mind of a game developer on the brink of physical and emotional burnout during the last stages of an intense project. Experience a metroidvania drenched in anxiety based on a very true story.

name: Shop Tycoon
description: Buy, sell, and build the largest shopping center in the city.

name: Omapeli
description: Omapeli is an action RPG setting in a medieval fantasy world. Explore different biomes and enter underworld dungeons. Meet friendly NPCs, hear their quests and trade. Fully customize your character. Craft your weapons - swords, bows and magic.

name: Guitar Maker
description: In the game "GuitarMaker" you play the role of a guitar craftsman. Build unique electric guitars. Develop your skills, choose the best wood and components, body shapes, varnish them and select electronics, to create perfect instruments. Gain recognition from customers and open your own music store.

name: Neon Intrusion
description: Become the ultimate agent in a world blending medieval intrigue with high-tech infiltration. Steal valuable treasures, assassinate targets, uncover hidden secrets and master the shadows. Augment your body to improve stealth, traversal and combat characteristics to become the ultimate killing machine

name: Dome RPG
description: "Dome RPG is a game about a boy who once woke up in a strange world. Explore a mysterious world with unique visuals, interesting characters and lots of mysteries to uncover!" (From Steam description)

name: Wit and Dice
description: WAD is a game where players challenge each other's luck and strategy using 8 dice!

name: WireWalking
description: WireWalking is a wire-walking simulation game that mimics real physics. Players take on the role of acrobats, traveling around the world to undertake wire-walking challenges. Utilize skills to control stamina and balance, and become a master!

name: Xilosaga
description: Xilosaga is an action and platform game where you play as Tatuapu, an Indian from a local tribe, who ventures out with the aim of purging a plague within the carrancas, which began to attract evil spirits and dominated the inhabitants of northeastern Brazil.

name: Lawn Mowing Simulator VR
description: Escape to a world where it’s always sunny and there is always grass that needs mowing – Lawn Mowing Simulator VR allows you to find your inner zen through the art of mowing and string trimming. Reach up, down and all around to maintain your equipment or complete your ground checks and mowing, or just sit back, relax and mow yourself into peacefulness. Explore unique locations and help make them look beautiful again through the power of garden maintenance.

name: Dark Memories: Prologue
description: Rent a cabin for a serene weekend, only to face a series of eerie puzzles in 'Dark Memories: Prologue'—an FPS thriller where every clue is a step towards escape.

name: Code Alpha: The Final Frontier
description: In "Code Alpha" battle alien invaders with advanced tech armor. Explore from cities to dungeons in mixed third-person and first-person views. Collect alien tech to upgrade gear and confront massive enemies and bosses. Your ultimate goal: defeat the alien mothership. Brace for a thrilling adventure!

name: Clumsy Cannon
description: Clumsy Cannon is a game where you play as a box with a cannon, trying to reach the top of different zones. Master the art of cannon propulsion and overcome various obstacles in this unique and challenging game.

name: Clicky
description: Bug-squashing, procedurally generated computer simulation with a heavy focus on 1990s technology and software.

name: Click To Clear
description: Click to Clear is a minimalist dungeon crawler that combines incremental clicker mechanics with a high fantasy RPG setting. Skillfully fight your way through a campaign spanning multiple diverse biomes against a large variety of challenging enemies and bosses.

name: Celestial Descends
description: "Tianlin Hunyuan" is a Chinese-style Xianxia SRPG with chess strategy and Roguelike elements, set in an open world. Players uncover lies and pursue freedom in a complex world of deep emotions and power struggles, embarking on an epic strategic and emotional adventure.

name: Cards and Creatures
description: Enhance your strategy and strengthen bonds with your creatures in this card battling, creature collecting roguelike. Cards and Creatures skilfully blends different genres into one addictive package!

name: Caustic Bloom
description: In this top-down Metroidvania, descend into the belly of Sarcophagus II, an underground laboratory overrun by mutated creatures. Blast your way through this labyrinth of chaos, facing overwhelming odds in an effort to rescue your friends and recover your humanity.

name: Catnip Dreams
description: Leap into this Catnip-induced Dream, a whimsical 2.5D platformer where you guide an auto-jumping cat through a dreamy world, mastering lateral movement and timing to overcome imaginative challenges and playful obstacles. BEWARE, this game will break you! Play at your own risk >:D

name: Multiplayer BattleTech: 3025
description: Multiplayer BattleTech: 3025 is an MMO action game, like MechWarrior 4: Vengeance, based on BattleTech: Firestorm arcade machines. The game was released as a beta in 2001 and shut down with little explanation on December 6, 2001.

name: Kritika: Zero
description: Immerse yourself in the heart-pounding world of Kritika: Zero, a dynamic online multiplayer game that combines lightning-fast combat, stunning visuals, and an ever-expanding universe. Choose your hero from diverse classes and customize your character to stand out in this action-packed realm.

name: Arsonate
description: Outwit the HOST in a death game where fire spreads with each flip of a card. Be the last to burn. Do you fear death?

name: Clown Around
description: An immersive simulator where you play as a clown.

name: NeverDone
description: NeverDone is a random room dungeon rogue-lite where a hero believes their journey is done. They defeated the Lich and located her last phylactery in the center of this dungeon. Alas, it was a trap and now the hero has to escape an ever expanding dungeon with the phylactery and withstand the lich’s minions.

name: Traumatizing Web-Tales
description:
Are you Nostalgic for Internet horror? cool, i am too
This mod is basically... a mod abt Internet horror!!!!

name: Palm House Pursuit
description: Are you ready to unravel the mysteries of the palm houses and become the catalyst for justice in Miami Beach? The pursuit begins now.

name: Bingo64
description: A Super Mario 64 ROM hack which adds a bingo mechanic.

name: Magic Campus
description:
Magic Campus is a classic MMORPG, with turn-based battles and countless missions to complete. The game features many exotic creatures, which can become pets that will accompany you through the vast world of Magic Campus and duel in your defense.

The game has a design with oriental characteristics. All this with beautiful graphics, which make PvP interaction much more fun and exciting. Magic Campus also contains six different character classes, each with different attributes, and a complex clan system that allows interaction between players.

name: Case 32
description: A series of mysterious murders takes place in a small provincial town. Detective Cooper must unravel a tangle of mystical, chilling events to get to the bottom of the mystery.

name: Carrot Survivors
description: Protect your factory from the wrath of nature and the greed of pacifying forces with the help of your coworkers and the strength of your professional skills. Fight against waves of enemies before the end of your work day: Extra hours will not be compensated.

name: Carrot Rescue
description: Carrot Rescue is a 2D pixel linear game, where you play the role of a farmer who must harvest his carrot crop before winter comes. However, there are various obstacles on your way: wild animals that are trying to eat your crops and evil farmers who want to steal it.

name: Carrot Buds
description: Embark on a heartwarming adventure as a courageous carrot risking his life to rescue one of the captured friends. Explore a vibrant farming world overcoming challenges, all in a bid to reunite with your friend.

name: 100 Cats Beijing
description: Find 100 Cats hidden in Beijing! Can you find them all?

name: Wasteland Survival
description: You are a Wasteland Cleaner! Cleanse the Earth from the evil consequences of Nuclear War and return to the Vault with victory!

name: The Three Kingdoms: The Story of Seeking Generals
description: The Three Kingdoms: The Story of Seeking Generals is the only real-time strategy game of the Three Kingdoms that does not draw cards. The Lord can experience the most exciting experience, the most pure strategy and the most sincere feelings of the Three Kingdoms!

name: Mushroom Collection
description: An RPG where a mushroom borrows the power of a witch for an adventure. It's a game that philosophizes what it means to be cute.

name: Touhou: Sougetsu-tou
description: Sin descripción

name: Iroase no Hate ni
description: Sin descripción

name: Toy Empires
description: Toy Empires is a unique fast-paced, micro-management-free real-time strategy game. All you have to do is make the purest decisions and games!

name: Wings of Endless
description:
Wings of Endless" is an action RPG that captivates with its platforming elements and a rich, pixel-art visual style. The game unfolds the story of Hariku, a confident bounty hunter whose routine mission evolves into an expansive quest, revealing the layers of a long-forgotten war. Accompanied by Owly, his mysterious talking owl, and a cast of unexpected allies, Hariku's journey spans across diverse and vivid landscapes filled with secrets, from desolate deserts and lush forests to icy expanses and marshlands​​​​.

The gameplay is dynamic, emphasizing a combat system that allows players to control three distinct heroes, each with unique abilities, and switch between them in real-time to unleash powerful combos. This system, alongside a vast world ripe for exploration, numerous side missions, a variety of challenging enemies, and intricate puzzles, ensures a gameplay experience that is both engaging and rewarding. Additionally, the game features a crafting system for consumables, further enriching the gameplay with strategic elements​

name: Sadlands
description: Sadlands is a typing game centered around positivity, positive reinforcement and keeping those skilled fingies nice and toasty.

name: Liftlands
description:
Liftlands is a highly interactive, sidescrolling, city-builder management game.

Gather resources and unlock new buildings
Help your villagers thrive by assigning them jobs
Balance development and defenses.
The village gets attacked at night, so build strong forces to defend your village!

name: Virus Kombat
description: A deadly virus is decimating the world's population and you are the only one who can stop this threat. Run around the scene collecting the necessary ingredients to produce the vaccine, after that, eliminate the virus and save the population, can you do it?

name: Hentai Arena Holy Pussy
description: In your hands is power, protect your kingdom from a horde of monsters.

name: SexyHub
description: The infamous 1982 classic called "Beat em and Eat Em" is reborn. The objective is simple - collect all the "white stuff". Survite 20 intense waves, with each wave the difficulty rapidly increases. Get rewarded with sexy and erotic artwork.

name: Flag Collection
description: Collect flags, feel flags, love flags.

name: Conker: Gettin' Medieval

name: Plants vs. Zombies: Project Hot Tub
description: Project Hot Tub was an open-world action-adventure game that combined the open-world gameplay of Uncharted 4: A Thief's End, the combat of Batman: Arkham Knight, and the family-friendly vibes of Ratchet & Clank. The game was being worked on by PopCap Vancouver in around 2015 and was planned to be released in early 2017. According to sources gathered by IGN, in the second half of 2016, the game was ready to show off to EA executives, but little did they know, EA would trash Project Hot Tub a few days later in order for them to get more working hands on the now-canceled Star Wars game codenamed Project Ragtag.

name: Plants vs. Zombies Presents: Talking Zombatar
description:
Talking Zombatar was a Talking Tom-like video game for iOS and Android that was being developed by PopCap and was going to be published by EA. That game featured a zombie who, if spoken to, would repeat what the user said back to them. The zombie could dance and be dressed up; there was also a camera with AR support for users to take photos and videos with.

It is unknown why this game was canceled.

name: Euro Truck Simulator 2: Nordic Horizons
description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 reveals another upcoming map expansion, the Nordic Horizons, taking players through the captivating landscapes of northern Europe!

The expansion features expansive fjords of Norway all the way to the Arctic Ocean, challenging bridges, underwater tunnels, and narrow roads, complete with encounters with reindeer and coastal fishing villages. Drive through Sweden’s Norrland, offering a diverse environment, from settled regions along the main E4 road to the barren hills of the Scandinavian mountains. Finland’s Lapland, with its dense coniferous forests to the expansive barren tundra, presents a stark contrast to the southern part of the country

The DLC includes tens of cities and towns, showcasing typical Nordic architecture and delving into Viking history. Additionally, Nordic Horizons promises a seamless blend of nature, history, and trucking excitement, offering players an unforgettable Nordic adventure. Get ready for a seriously big adventure with this expansion which offers so much to explore!

Use a wide arsenal of weapons - from blasters and firearms to axes and brass knuckles - to overcome your opponents. Choose unique tactics to survive and rise to the top.

name: BattlePlatform

name: BallCore

name: Station Sabotage
description:
A multiplayer adventure set in the depths of space. Unravel mysteries, strategize for survival, and explore the unknown in this captivating cosmic escapade.

Station Sabotage invites players into a shadowy, futuristic world of mystery and survival. Aboard a forsaken space station, teams of explorers face unknown challenges and hidden dangers. In this multiplayer adventure, strategy and cooperation are key as players encounter an array of obstacles and enigmatic threats. The heart of the game lies in its unique, suspense-filled objectives, where choices have lasting consequences on the game's progression and the unfolding narrative.

The game's immersive environment is heightened by its dynamic design, where no two playthroughs are alike, and unexpected twists keep players constantly on their toes. With a variety of roles to assume, each player's experience is tailored to their decisions and interactions within this treacherous space station.

Station Sabotage combines elements of mystery, strategy, and survival, making each session a fresh journey into the unknown. It's more than just a game – it's an ever-evolving story waiting to be unravelled.

Our main goals for this project is to give a new feel, look to the original Half-Life, with adding more features, improved level design that many people love from Black Mesa remake but with additional things, to make it a bit more unique. Black Mesa: Classic aims to be capabile on any PC without high requiremnts, with better visuals and effects to make your Half-Life 1 campaign experience the best!

description: This time, Batman is in for an interesting and dangerous adventure. While he was busy with important things, enemies managed to attack Gotham City, and now Batman must quickly eliminate them. Night does not last long, but during this time he has to manage to kill all the aliens. So Batman will be jumping on the rooftops, climbing to the top floors and kill the enemies. During the game, he will be given hints by the Blue Beetle - his loyal friend. Play Batman and help him overcome all obstacles. Collect boomerangs, because it is the main weapon used by our hero. Also collect badges to earn big points in the game. Kill the enemies as fast as possible and try to save your own life. Good luck!

name: Stellar Wander DX
description: Stellar Wanderer DX is an old-school space combat sim set in a vast open-world universe. Follow the story or choose your favorite side missions as a mercenary fighter pilot. Explore the galaxy, upgrade your ship and weapons, trade resources and fight outlaws.

name: Project Madras
description:
Project Madras, is a semi-linear open-world game, being developed in Chennai, India, by a small team and led by developer leader Royston.

Explore and experience the vibe of namma chennai through "PROJECT MADRAS". The game which lets you roam around the shores of Marina ,streets of mount road , monuments of chennai covering all the highlights of this city ,with a mission to accomplish!.

The flavour of this open world game is rich in content and language, as it takes place in the capital city of the state, where the world's oldest language "TAMIL" is still surviving and embraced over centuries. Get involved with the natives of the city, where a rooted love and affection is served with some spicy madras delicacy.

name: Hannah Montana: Wireless Quest
description: Sin descripción

name: Project U
description:
Codename "Project U" is a new kind of session-based cooperative shooter, in which players unite in massive battles against overwhelming legions of machines.
Ubisoft will have a PC-only Closed Test from February 1-6 in Europe and North America.

The game’s plot revolves around an invasion from the “machines”, who have one goal to ‘machineform’ all life. Players play as the ‘immune’, who are hero characters that seemingly can’t be machine-formed. A total of six characters currently exist, which are; Summer, Tau, Z-Rex, Lodestar, Swei, and Gallowglass.

name: Bananaventure
description: Bananaventure is a small 2d endless platform game with collectable gems and highscore.

name: Photogenic
description: I wanted to become a doll inside a shop window.

name: Fertilizer
description: Alaska, a girl who loves to take care of plants, draw and hang out with her best friend. This time she will need your help to fertilize the new plants which she bought, and I'm sure you will work well together. I think you'll even learn a few new and effective gardening tips!

name: Nowhere
description:
Nowhere is a Nordic inspired narrative mystery/horror game, revolving around Nordic mythology and what happened to these Gods after Ragnarök and how the rise of Christianity impacted them and their worship.

Featuring the mixing styles of detective gameplay and survival horror, It's going to appeal to people who love a good mystery and also love to be scared, wandering through these haunting atmospheres, feeling something watching them at every turn while the tension builds and builds until the world turns into a nightmare and its fight or flight.

name: Pokémon Modern Emerald
description: A ROM hack of Pokémon Emerald with enhancements which modernize the game but also make it stay true to the vanilla experience. Optional features include: physical and special move split, reuseable TM's, a built-in Nuzlocke mode, and more. Made by resetes12.

name: Sus Hat
description: A game with mostly linearly gameplay and turn-based battles about looking for secrets and colecting items, outfits and equipment.

name: Dungeons and Dungeons
description: Sadie and Max through a treacherous maze of levels (6 in all), fending off attacks from wandering dungeon-dwellers and mechanical pleasure-bots.

name: Sweet Flowers and Salt
description:
Accompany the hardworking Salt as she looks after a beautiful garden. A cute healing type of game that's as sweet as Salt herself.

Grow flowers with Salt, harvest and collect in your collection box to level up, and reach the 99th level for your wish for happiness to be granted.

name: McWorld
description: McWorld was a flash-based virtual-world MMO created by McDonalds in 2008. The in-game world was divided into a variety of themed areas with their own unique minigames, shops, and media tie-ins. Players could customize their avatar and treehouse with various items and accessories, some of which were based on McDonalds products.

name: Pokémon Infinite Heardle
description:
A clone of Heardle, and K-Pop Heardle which can be played infinitely and with Pokémon's musics. Based on Joywave Heardle code and Pokémon Heardle musics.

Each music is randomly chosen from mainline Pokémon's game soundtrack.

name: Etrian Odyssey Heardle
description:
A clone of Heardle, and K-Pop Heardle but for Etrian Odyssey musics. Based on Joywave Heardle.

Each Etrian Odyssey Heardle is randomly chosen from Etrian Odyssey's soundtrack.

name: Guardian Frame: Debrief!
description: Guardian Frame: Debrief! is a lighthearted, low-intensity dress-up game about two girls in love: a giant robot, and the engineer that pilots and maintains her.

name: DC: Dark Legion
description: DC: Dark Legion is an official authorized DC role-playing strategy game, let us team up with DC superheroes, build the shelter and explore the DC universe.

name: Bells 'n' Whistles
description: Bells 'n' Whistles is a difficult point-and-click game that tests your ability to multitask. You must deal with the multiple systems on a machine in order to prevent it from breaking down. Are you up to the task?
